title: Chudithar Anindhu Lyrics Poovellam Kettuppar
stanzas:
Chudithar Anindhu Vandha Sorgame Lyrics Poovellam Kettuppar
#Yuvan #Hariharan #SadhanaSargam

Chudithar anindhu
vandha sorgame
en meedhu
kadhal vandhadhu
eppodhu endru konjam
nee sollvaayaa
nee sollvaayaa
nee sollvaayaa

Vizhival paarthu
konjam vandhadhu
viral serthu konjam
vandhadhu
mulu kadhal endru
vandhadhu
theriyaadhe...
adhu theriyaadhe..
adhu theriyaadhe..

unmel naan konda kadhal
enmel nee konda kadhal
edhai nee uyarvaaga
solvaayo

podaa pollaadha paiyaa
nam mel naam konda kadhal
adhi nee rendaaga
paarpaayaa

Chudithar anindhu
vandha sorgame
en meedhu
kadhal vandhadhu
eppodhu endru konjam
nee sollvaayaa

unpaerai sonnaale
naan thirumbi paarkiren
unpaerai mattumthaan
naan virumbi kaetkiren

iruval oruvaraai
inaidhu vittom
irandu peyar
yaenadi ?

unakul naan ennai
karaithu vitten
unnaye kaelu nee

adi unnai naan marandha
velayil un kadhal
maarumaa!!

vidikaalai thamarai
poovidhu vinmeenai
paarkkumaa

unmel naan konda kadhal
enmel nee konda kadhal
edhai nee uyarvaaga
solvaayo

podaa pollaadha paiyaa
nam mel naam konda kadhal
adhi nee rendaaga
paarpaayaa

Chudithar anindhu
vandha sorgame
en meedhu
kadhal vandhadhu
eppodhu endru konjam
nee sollvaayaa

pala kodi pengalile
edarkennai thaedinaai
naan thaedum pennaaga
neethaane thondrinaai

narai koodum naatkalile
enai konja thondrumaa
adi podi kadhaliye
narai kooda thondrumaa

un kannil unnaada
kadhalidhu mudividum
ennamo

en nenjil undaana
kadhal idhu
nenjai vittu pogumo

unmel naan konda kadhal
enmel nee konda kadhal
edhai nee uyarvaaga
solvaayo

podaa pollaadha paiyaa
nam mel naam konda kadhal
adhi nee rendaaga
paarpaayaa

Chudithar anindhu
vandha sorgame
en meedhu
kadhal vandhadhu
eppodhu endru konjam
nee sollvaayaa

Vizhival paarthu
konjam vandhadhu
viral serthu konjam
vandhadhu
mulu kadhal endru
vandhadhu
theriyaadhe...
adhu theriyaadhe..
adhu theriyaadhe..
